title: SHOW SHARES command: New column (SECURE_OBJECTS_ONLY) | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_04 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the output of the SHOW SHARES command includes the following new column(s):
Indicates if non-secure objects are enabled:
If TRUE, the share allows secure views only.
If FALSE, the share also allows non-secure views.
